item.link: $doregex[get-rtmp]/privatestream/ app=privatestream/ playpath=$doregex[path] swfUrl=http://privatestream.tv/js/jwplayer.flash.swf flashVer=WIN\2020,0,0,267 swfVfy=1 live=1 timeout=13 pageUrl=http://privatestream.tv/player?streamname=fawergge

regex.name: get-rtmp
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url='http://privatestream.tv/player?streamname=fawergge'):
import requests import re
source = requests.get(url) var_a = re.findall('var a = (.*?);', source.text)[0] var_b = re.findall('var b = (.*?);', source.text)[0] var_c = re.findall('var c = (.*?);', source.text)[0] var_d = re.findall('var d = (.*?);', source.text)[0] var_f = re.findall('var f = (.*?);', source.text)[0]
a= int(float(var_a))/int(float(var_f)) b= int(float(var_b))/int(float(var_f)) c= int(float(var_c))/int(float(var_f)) d= int(float(var_d))/int(float(var_f))
rtmp = 'rtmp://' + str(a) + '.' + str(b) + '.' + str(c) + '.' + str(d) return rtmp
